experience.description: Working on the Agoda iOS app—a globally recognized travel booking platform. Delivering features end-to-end with SwiftUI and SDUI; led architecture refactoring for recommendation/cross-sell module; contributed to App Refresh (UIKit to SwiftUI); migrated session recovery to SwiftData; optimized performance and resolved production issues. Collaborating with product, design, backend, and analytics across multiple repositories.

Real-time messaging and customer engagement platform. Architected and implemented features using SwiftUI and Combine; reengineered core app components for responsiveness and load times; collaborated with cross-functional teams on onboarding; enforced coding standards and code reviews.

CommChat—secure, end-to-end encrypted messaging app with chat, screen sharing, and backup/restore. Engineered core chat (E2E encryption, backup/restore, screen-sharing); developed low-level networking layer; refined architecture and API specs; mentored junior developers.

Travel booking platform for flights, hotels, and holiday packages. Built and integrated holiday and vehicle booking features; restructured flight and hotel booking systems; partnered with designers on iOS experience; guided new team members and assisted in sprint planning and release management.

SmartThings iOS app—smart home automation. Designed modular UI components with UIKit AutoLayout; restructured legacy codebase for testability and increased test coverage by 20%; led knowledge-sharing sessions for Samsung Software Competency Test.
Designed and developed REST APIs with .Net; wrote complex SQL stored procedures for eCommerce profit calculation; diagnosed system issues and implemented feature enhancements (uVited, CondoNow).
